This class will be distributed as “simultaneous two-way class via Zoom” from Session 2. An email with the Zoom link to join this class has been sent to all registered users in LUNA. If you are not registered in LUNA or if you did not receive the link please contact the instructor by email: matthias.hennings@kwansei.ac.jp. Based on weekly readings and class discussions, students will gain an understanding of characteristics and phenomena of the Japanese employment system. At the beginning of each class students will present a summary of the assigned readings followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor, such as newspaper articles, recent statistics and film clips from documentaries and interviews.
